title: Topic 004 Question 026
body: You need to deploy an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) solution that will use Windows Server 2019 nodes. The solution must meet the following requirements:
✑ Minimize the time it takes to provision compute resources during scale-out operations.
✑ Support autoscaling of Windows Server containers.
Which scaling option should you recommend?
options: Virtual nodes with Virtual Kubelet ACI
